attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown must go NOW. He is arrogant, has no charisma nor any idea how to run the country. He was not elected by the British public. Gordon Brown must resign now, he is not our prime minister and never will be.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
